name: Gidilounge
tag_list: nigerian-entertainment, nigerian-music, african-music, african-radio, online-radio, music-streaming
overview:
Gidilounge is a digital media company that is reinventing the way Africans discover, listen and enjoy African Music. The company offers online media products such a music streaming service which connects users with music and makes it easy and simple to search for and play any song, album, artist or playlist of their favorite African musicians. Gidilounge Radio, a Mobile Radio station, which provides a mix of talk, music, and African entertainment.

Gidilounge currently run an advertising revenue generated business model. In 2012, Gidilounge launched a mobile application on iOS, Android and Blackberry mobile devices.
